TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Cookie extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组用于管理 Cookie 的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides a set of properties and methods that are used to manage cookies.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端应用程序使用 类来检索有关使用 HTTP 响应接收的 cookie 的信息。The class is used by a client application to retrieve information about cookies that are received with HTTP responses. 分析 HTTP 响应标头时，支持以下 cookie 格式：原始 Netscape 规范、RFC 2109 和 RFC 2965。The following cookie formats are supported during parsing of the HTTP response headers: the original Netscape specification, RFC 2109, and RFC 2965. 有关 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅各种 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the various constructors. ## Examples 下面的示例将请求发送到 URL，并显示在响应中返回的 cookie。The following example sends a request to a URL and displays the cookies returned in the response. [!code-cpp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CPP/cookiessnippets.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CS/cookiessnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/VB/cookiessnippets.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 通常，应用程序无需构造 类，因为该类会基于通过 HTTP 响应接收的 Set-Cookie 标头自动创建。

span.span: In general, an application does not need to construct a class because it is created automatically based on the Set-Cookie header received with the HTTP response.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数将所有字段初始化为其默认值，并对 `name`、`value`、`path`和 `domain`使用空字符串（""）。The parameterless constructor initializes all fields to their default values, using empty strings ("") for `name`, `value`, `path`, and `domain`. 请注意，必须先初始化 属性，然后才能使用 类的实例。Note that at least the property must be initialized before using an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端可以为服务器添加的信息检查此可选注释。The client can inspect this optional comment for information added by the server. 例如，服务器可能包括有关隐私策略或预期使用情况之类的问题的信息。For example, the server could include information about issues like the privacy policy or intended usage. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `true`时，此属性指示客户端应用程序在会话结束时不会将 保存在用户的硬盘上。When `true`, this property instructs the client application not to save the on the user's hard disk when a session ends. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器不能指示域，而不是其自身的 URI。A server cannot indicate a domain other than its own URI. 但是，它可以指示域中的多台服务器。However, it can indicate more than one server in the domain. 默认值是从其接收此 cookie 的主机。The default value is the host that this cookie has been received from. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. span.span: The 32-bit signed integer hash code for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能用作哈希表中的键的类必须提供此重写，因为在哈希表中用作键的对象需要通过此方法生成它们自己的哈希代码。Classes that might be used as a key in a hash table must provide this override, because objects that are used as keys in a hash table are required to generate their own hash code through this method.

The URIs to which the applies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定此 适用于的源服务器上的 Uri 的子集。The property specifies the subset of URIs on the origin server to which this applies. 如果未指定此属性，则此 将发送到源服务器或服务器上的所有页面。If this property is not specified, then this will be sent to all pages on the origin server or servers. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. span.span: The list of TCP ports that the applies to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性限制可将此 发送到的端口。This attribute restricts the ports to which this may be sent. 默认值表示没有限制。The default value means no restriction. 将此项设置为空字符串（""）会将端口限制为在 HTTP 响应中使用的端口。Setting this to the empty string ("") will restrict the port to the one used in the HTTP response. 否则，该值必须是一个带双引号的字符串，该字符串包含用逗号分隔的端口值。Otherwise, the value must be a double-quoted string that contains port values delimited with commas. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. value.span: 如果客户端仅在使用安全超文本传输协议 (HTTPS) 的后继请求中返回 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the client is only to return the cookie in subsequent requests if those requests use Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTPS); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实际上，当此属性 `true` 时，此 cookie 只能与 https://请求一起发送。In effect, when this property is `true` this cookie may be sent only with https:// requests. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. span.span: Returns a string representation of this object that is suitable for including in a HTTP Cookie: request header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的确切格式取决于此 cookie 符合的 RFC。The exact format of the string depends on the RFC that this cookie conforms to. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的字符串值。The following example displays the string value of a cookie returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. summary.span: 获取或设置 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for the .
The for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不得 `null` 的 。The of a must not be `null`. 如果将 `null` 值分配给此属性，则会将其替换为空字符串。If a `null` value is assigned to this property, it's replaced with an empty string. 分号和逗号是保留字符，不能在此属性的值中使用。Semicolons and commas are reserved characters that cannot be used in the value of this property. 为此属性指定无效字符不会引发异常;但是，当你尝试使用 方法将此 添加到 实例时，该操作将失败并引发异常。Assigning invalid characters to this property doesn't throw an exception; but when you try to add this to a instance with the method, the operation will fail and throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. summary.span: 获取或设置此 Cookie 符合的 HTTP 状态维护版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the version of HTTP state maintenance to which the cookie conforms.

value.span: 此 Cookie 符合的 HTTP 状态维护版本。

span.span: The version of HTTP state maintenance to which the cookie conforms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值为0，遵循原始的 Netscape 规范。The default value for the property is 0, complying with the original Netscape specification. 如果将值显式设置为1，则此 必须符合 RFC 2109。If the value is explicitly set to 1, then this must conform to RFC 2109. 请注意，如果 是通过接收 Cookie2 HTTP 响应标头自动创建的，则将一致性设置为 RFC 2965。Note that if a was created automatically by receiving a Set-Cookie2 HTTP response header, the conformance is set to RFC 2965. 如果尝试将 属性设置为小于零的值，则将引发异常。An attempt to set the property to a value less than zero will throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了在响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. [!code-cpp[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CPP/cookiessnippets.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CS/cookiessnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/VB/cookiessnippets.vb#3)]

exception.span: 不允许使用为版本指定的值。

span.span: The value specified for a version is not allowed.
